channel.title: 足球 on 爱豆吧！
channel.description: Recent content in 足球 on 爱豆吧！

item.title: HAPPY BIRTHDAY, INTER
item.description: 在国米百年诞辰的时候写给俱乐部的一封信。 从1998年开始关注追随国际米兰，注册了俱乐部会员。每个生日的前夕都会受到一个合成背后印着名字，号码是当时年龄的蓝黑间条衫。 Hi Inter, HAPPY BIRTHDAY !!! I am an Inter fan of China, a postgraduate student of a University in the Northwest of China. I have been the fan of Inter for 12 years. Football was not as popular as it is now in China 12 years ago. I have to admit that one critical reason why I have deep feeling of Inter rather than AC Milan which was highly regarded by lots of my friends is because of Ronaldo.
